articles.title: Can acquisitions help Cipla beef up its portfolio? - Mint
articles.description: Cipla targets smaller companies in India, South Africa, North America and Australia to strengthen its portfolio
articles.content: With Ciplas promoter stake sale jammed in high-valuations, it is targeting smaller companies in India, South Africa, North America and Australia to strengthen its portfolio, said experts. Cipla has t… [+3425 chars]
